Description:
IT Application Analyst / Developer – Techno Funct. ERPROLE PURPOSE:The Applications Analyst / Developer will be responsible for gathering Business requirements from business units and end users, analysing these requirements, setting and designing solutions architecture, the development of software applications/solutions, testing, implementation and maintenance of AlKoot IT Applications and solutions portfolio.KEY ACCOUNTABILITIES: Deal and manage Budget & Planning is a must
Deal and manage MIS QCB reporting and Borad, Profit, Loss, Actuals, /… reporting is a must
Deal and manage IFRS17 Highly is a must
Deal and manage Oracle BI analytic tool and MS Power BI
Deal and manage BPM and process automation
General Insurance and Motor hands-on and full understanding and strong skills and background
claims, Insurance and Re-Insurance, policy and treaty issuance, finance, AP,AR, GLs, month end, year rend, )
System integrations and APIs
System requirements gathering, Analysis, Design, Development & Implementation
Solution Architectures and design with align to the enterprise architecture
Writing technical specifications documents and designing solutions resulted from the BRDs and Functional specifications documents and develop the solution/application
Functional and business knowledge in Finance and Insurance business
Data structure design, development and creation of packages, procedures and functions based on business requirements in Oracle Database 10G+.
Ensures that data structure design is scalable and maintainable.
Performance monitoring, reporting, and tuning of Oracle reporting databases.
Provision of support and assistance in the design, testing, tuning and implementation of database applications
Writing / Tuning data ingestion procedures from external suppliers and partners using PL/SQL, SQL loader, 3rd party tools like Toad etc.Skills
Skills:
Bachelor Degree in IT or IT related field
ERP excellent knowledge all modules Finance, HR, PRO – Oracle EBS
SDLC full project cycle experience 
6 minimum years’ experience in developing software applications, preferably, out of which at least 3 years with insurance applications.
Knowledge of the Project Management and in the preparation of the document like Project Plans, WBS and Project Status reports.
Excellent skill and knowledge of budgeting and board reporting and dashboards
Experience of using Business Objects and report building functions from User through to Admin.
Experience of BI reports creation and publishing, Reporting tools such as EPM / ECC/ Analytic Server / BI Publisher
Designing and development in Oracle forms and reports 10G+, In-depth knowledge and experience in Oracle 9i/10g+, 12c
APEX development strong skills
In-depth knowledge and experience in SQL and PL/SQL including tuning.
Writing ad-hoc queries based on schema knowledge for various reporting requirements.
Experience with Unix / Linux / Windows Server 2003 including basic commands and shell scripting.
In-depth knowledge and experience in Import/Export, SQL*Loader planning.
Oracle OCP Certification is a plus.
Familiarity with Oracle specific tools and utilities.
Knowledge of Quest TOAD
Knowledge of open source web development and Java is a plus
Excellent Business intelligent and dashboard
Release Management and version control knowledge
Excellent Business and system analysis skills
Project management skills
Designing and development in forms and reports 12C+, Apex (From 20.2), BI Publisher 12C+.
Excellent knowledge and skill in system integrations and APIs

Preferred.Nationality: All Arab Countries; Malaysia; Philippines; Singapore; Southeast Asia
